page.description: Returns a CRLF delimited list of operations for the specified table or set name
page.syntax: List as C = a5_get_operations(C operation_type [,C tablename ])

argument.name: List
argument.description: A CR-LF delimited list of saved operations.

argument.name: operation_type
argument.description: The type of operation to return. For example: "export", "mark".

argument.name: tablename
argument.description: The table that contains the operations.

page.discussion: The A5_GET_OPERATIONS() function returns a list of the saved operations of a specified type.
